metadata.title: CVE-2015-2181 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple buffer overflows in the DBMail driver in the Password plugin inRoundcube before 1.1.0 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impactvia the (1) password or (2) username.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
